component.name: core

hookregister.name: /core/components/loaded
hookregister.description: Called immediately after all components have been loaded into memory.

hookregister.name: /core/components/ready
hookregister.description: Called after all components have been loaded into memory and made available.

hookregister.name: /core/session/ready
hookregister.description: Called after the session is available

hookregister.name: /core/page/preexecute
hookregister.description: Called before the page is executed

hookregister.name: /core/page/postexecute
hookregister.description: Called immediately after a successful page execution, but before any rendering

hookregister.name: /core/page/error-404
hookregister.description: Called anytime there is a 404 error

hookregister.name: /core/page/error-403
hookregister.description: Called anytime there is a 403 error

hookregister.name: /core/page/rendering
hookregister.description: Called during page rendering. This is called after the page execution, but just before the metadata and head data is finalized. If you need something to modify data based on the page output, use this!

hookregister.name: /core/page/postrender
hookregister.description: Called after all the rendering has been completed on the page.

hookregister.name: /core/admin/view
hookregister.description: Called when an admin views the /admin page. Useful for functions that need to inform the admin of happenings or what not.

hookregister.name: /core/model/presave
hookregister.description: Called immediately before a model save

hookregister.name: /core/model/postsave
hookregister.description: Called immediately after a model save

hookregister.name: /core/controllinks/user/view
hookregister.description: Control links when viewing a specific user

hookregister.name: /user/postsave
hookregister.description: Hook that is called after the user object is saved

hookregister.name: /user/postlogin/getredirecturl
hookregister.description: Hook that is called after the user has successfully logged in. Return a non-empty string to redirect to that page.

hookregister.name: /sitemap/getlisting
hookregister.description: Called during the listing retrieval of the links to display in the sitemap. Useful for injecting links into the sitemap and sitemap.xml.

hookregister.name: /core/shutdown
hookregister.description: Hooks onto the PHP shutdown_register function to be called very very last after any page execution.

component.description: The core application, including all libraries required for a base application.

config.description: Amazon Web Services Key. Found in the AWS Security Credentials.
Amazon Web Services Secret Key. Found in the AWS Security Credentials.
Amazon Account ID without dashes. Used for identification with Amazon EC2. Found in the AWS Security Credentials.
Your CanonicalUser ID. Used for setting access control settings in AmazonS3. Found in the AWS Security Credentials.
Your CanonicalUser DisplayName. Used for setting access control settings in AmazonS3. Found in the AWS Security Credentials (i.e. "Welcome, AWS_CANONICAL_NAME").
apc; file; memcache; xcache; BLAH

config.title: Use Minified Javascript & CSS
config.description: Try to use minified javascript and CSS files whenever possible.

config.title: Minify HTML Markup
config.description: Try to collapse rendered markup whenever possible.
Auto-incrementer for the asset version; incremented by calling reinstall on the system.

config.title: Use Proxy-Friendly Asset Versioning
config.description: Use proxy friendly version strings for assets instead of query string version. Requires the appropriate .htaccess file in place!
Time to live for sessions. Amount of seconds to keep an idle session active before requesting the user to log back in due to inactivity.
Email address emails should be sent 'from' by defualt.
Name emails should be sent 'from' by default.
Security mode for connecting to the SMTP server
Verify email domains via DNS lookups. May slow down email validation slightly, but ensures a valid domain.
Set to false to disable sending emails globally. Useful for development or stage environments.
Set to an email address to override all emails to be forwarded to a given email. Useful for development or stage environments.
Value for the X-Frame-Options header.
Lock this version of Core and its libraries at the feature version it is currently at, (Recommended for enterprise sites).
If a captcha system is available, set to true to require it to be completed on the registration page.
Minimum password length for users.
Minimum number of symbols in the password, ($@#*, etc).
Minumum number of capital letters in the password.
Minumum number of numbers in the password.

The user field to use for displaying in representation of the user, ie: username or email. If 'email' is used, the full email is displayed. If 'emailbase' id used, just the prefix of the email is used.
What to call guest/unauthenticated users.
The auth driver(s) to have enabled on the site, separate multiple drivers with a pipe (|)
Allow public registrations
Require administrative approvals on new accounts
Allow the user to change his/her email address after account registration.
Set to false to disable the use of avatars throughout the system.
If model auditing is available, it will be used to require administrative approval for profile edits.
How long should the full verbose user activity be kept.
Frequency to rotate log files
Compress rotated log files
How many rotated log files to keep, set to 0 to disable purging old logs.
User-frontend Skin

config.title: Remove "stop" words from titles
config.description: "Stop" words are words that many search engines ignore such as "a", "an", "the", etc. Please note, this only applies to new pages and pages that do not have the SEO title field explicitly set.

The title template for SEO titles on pages. You can enter various keywords here to have them automatically replaced with the appropriate values. Please note, this only applies to page that do not already have their SEO title explicitly set.

If this is blank, then the page title will be used as the SEO title as-is.

config.title: Meta Description Template
config.description:
The meta description (aka teaser), template on pages. You can enter various keywords here to have them automatically replaced with the appropriate values. Please note, this only applies to page that contain a blank meta description/teaser value.

If this is blank, then no automatic teaser is generated.

config.title: Enable Anonymous-User Page Cache
config.description: Check to enable page-level caching for anonymous users. This is highly effective for static sites, but strongly recommended against for web applications and dynamic sites.

permission.description: Search for users in the system via autocomplete widgets
Can assume the role of ANY other use on the system.
View all pages defined on the system along with some metadata about them
Manage all pages defined on the system along with some metadata about them
View all widgets defined on the system along with some metadata about them
Manage all widgets defined on the system along with some metadata about them
